name: mithraic

relating to Mithraism (= a religion that was popular in ancient Rome), or to the god Mithras : Several Mithraic temples have been discovered in the UK. Mithraic priests were thought to have supernatural powers.
More examplesFewer examplesBells were commonly used in Mithraic rituals.She is a respected scholar in the field of Mithraic studies.He believed that he had cleansed his soul through Mithraic ritual.Mithraic beliefs seem to have varied from location to location.The relief appears to depict a Mithraic initiation ceremony.
